amendment.description: To provide that, of the amount appropriated or otherwise made available by title II for the Air force for operation and maintenance, up to $10,000,000 may be available for an interoperable communications capability for the United States Northern Command.

vote.text: Amendment SA 4776 as modified agreed to in Senate by Voice Vote.

action.text: Amendment SA 4776 proposed by Senator Salazar. (consideration: CR S8585-8587, S8590; text: CR S8586) To provide that, of the amount appropriated or otherwise made available by title II for the Air force for operation and maintenance, up to $10,000,000 may be available for an interoperable communications capability for the United States Northern Command.
Senate amendment agreed to: Amendment SA 4776 as modified agreed to in Senate by Voice Vote.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 4776 proposed by Senator Salazar.
